meanings.definition: The quality or state of being heterogeneous.
meanings.sent1: The heterogeneousness of the salad made it interesting to taste.
meanings.sent2: The heterogeneousness of the student population enriched the classroom discussions.
meanings.sent3: The heterogeneousness of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put together.
meanings.sent4: The city's heterogeneousness was like a colorful mosaic of cultures.
meanings.sent5: The heterogeneousness of the forest was a sight to behold, with various trees and plants blending together.

meanings.definition: The presence of diverse elements or components within a group or mixture.
meanings.sent1: The heterogeneousness of opinions in the meeting led to a lively debate.
meanings.sent2: The heterogeneousness of ingredients in the soup created a unique flavor.
meanings.sent3: The heterogeneousness of colors in the painting gave it a vibrant look.
meanings.sent4: The team's heterogeneousness in skills complemented each other well.
meanings.sent5: The heterogeneousness of spices in the dish added depth to the taste.
